name: Latias Prism Star
author: Anesaki Dynamic
flavor_text: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.

attacks.name: Dreamy Mist
attacks.effect: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to each of your Basic Benched {N} Pokémon.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
